about_the_game:
Dedicated to my daughter. Wherever you are, I hope you know that you are loved.

Fling your Friends TD is the ultimate party game that will have you and your friends laughing, strategizing, and outsmarting each other in the most entertaining showdown ever! In this game, players take on the roles of either the Defender or the Attackers in a wild and whimsical battle of wits and creativity.

Defender:

  • Build Your Fortress: Carefully place traps and obstacles to create a formidable defense that will challenge the Attackers.

  • Special Abilities: Use unique abilities to disrupt and thwart the Attackers' progress, adding an extra layer of strategy to your defenses.

Attacker:

  • Plan and Conquer: Strategically plan your route and collaborate with your friends (or go solo) to navigate through the Defender's traps.

  • Character Progression: Level up your character's skills and counter the Defender's strategies.

  • Overcome Challenges: Utilize special abilities to outmaneuver obstacles and reach your goal.

Key Features

  • Cooperative PvP Multiplayer: Engage in thrilling multiplayer modes, teaming up with and against friends in a battle of cunning.

  • Creative Trap: Place an array of imaginative traps that will keep the Attackers on their toes.

  • Hilarious Gameplay: Experience the fun and chaos of a light-hearted game designed to bring joy and laughter to your gaming sessions.

  • Strategic Depth: Balance creativity and strategy to outwit your opponents and achieve victory.

  • Vibrant Visuals: Enjoy colorful and cartoony graphics that enhance the game's charm and appeal.

  • Replayability: Every game offers a unique experience with countless trap combinations and strategies to explore.

name: Fling your Friends TD - Tower Defense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 240
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gather your friends, unleash your creativity, and dive into the whimsical world of Fling your Friends TD. It's more than just a game—it's a laughter-filled adventure where strategy meets fun!
